channel.title: Comments on: Family-Integrated Church 11: Commendation for “A Weed in the Church” (Part 1)

item.title: By: Shawn Mathis
item.dc:creator: Shawn Mathis
item.description:
Greetings,
Sorry for the ugly link above; here's a cleaner one: http://www.weswhite.net/2011/04/family-integrated-mathis/
I am interacting with a current church member of Mr. Brown's church plant and one-time intern and current employee of the NCFIC at wes white's site above (under Rejoinder to Recent FIC Comments).
I have written a review of Mr. Brown's book. I also have extensive historical background on Christian education contrary to his books thesis at my blog.
I think our approaches can be quite supplementary. Please feel free to email for more details.
thank you,
